messages.content:
We are living through a challenging time in our country's future. But this is not a time to gamble on the extremism of right or left. 
Theresa May's Tory party acts increasingly like Blukip as she pursues a Hard Brexit that could do long-term damage to our economy and our communities. And, under Jeremy Corbyn, Labour is simply not up to the task. 
This is why I urge you to support the Liberal Democrats at this election. Every vote we gain nationally is a vote for an outward-looking, confident, optimistic future. 
To the communities feeling ignored and rejected I would say this: no party works harder to get your views heard. As a Rothwell councillor, and leader of the Liberal Democrats on Leeds City Council, this has always been my driving force.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes Hard Brexit to avoid long-term damage to the economy and communities.
No party works harder to get local views heard.
